title: PES Btech
content:
Guys, when is the btech cse starting for the batch of 2027? Also what is the approx gap between 2nd round of counselling and start date?

TIA

comments.body: At this point I don't think so even pes management knows when is the starting date
fr, they don't even seem to known when to conduct the 2nd round counselling

The 2nd round counselling could be on 5th/6th(going by lastvdate of seat surrender)
So classes will probably start around 20th
ALL THIS IS A GUESS

But what if 2nd round counselling are offline then how will someone from other state come just the next as we have to get the demand drafts ready and then even flights won't assure if we get there the next day in the morning right
